DOC.criteria: Agree study procedure , sign IC two way ; Patients older 18 year , male female , regardless ethnicity social class ; Presence mild moderate stress , confirm Stress Symptom Inventory ( ISS ) ; Presence staff fatigue score great 36 accord Fatigue Severity Scale ( FSS ) . Constitute exclusion criterion study : Participation clinical trial 12 month precede survey ; Current treatment drug stimulants central nervous system depressant hypnotic , anxiolytic , antipsychotic , antidepressant , statin muscle relaxant ; Alternative therapy scientifically , influence table stress fatigue color therapy , acupuncture relaxing massage ; Treatment psychotherapeutic medication ; Current treatment prediction treatment oral anticoagulant ( due interaction tocopherol ) ; Women pregnant lactating ; Patients lactose intolerance ; Patients allergic soy peanut ; chronic renal failure ; Patients use multivitamin individual vitamin vitamin D / A . Chronic alcoholism ; Patients clinical diagnosis disease cause severe chronic pain adversely affect clinical interpretation fibromyalgia , multiple sclerosis , neuropathy myopathy ; Patients hypothyroidism hyperthyreosis diagnose clinically ; Patient history physical examination suggestive severe hepatorenal failure ; Patients decompensated diabetes mellitus ( fast glucose 180 mg / dL ) ; Patients undergo treatment cancer ; Amendment routine life study early vacation suspect change work hour ; Patients complaint excessive sleepiness cause organic disease sleep apnea morbid obesity ( BMI 35 ) ; History hypersensitivity component product investigation ; Any find clinical observation ( clinical history physical examination ) interpret physician investigator risk patient 's participation study .
